CustomField.description: [DrawLoop]: Used in WF Outbound Message [Task 11630] DDP = Licensing Application Summary Report ; Delivery = SMTP - ODJFS IA Submitted & SMTP - ODE IA Submitted
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "Child Care Center",CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "FCC - Type A Home",CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "FCC - Type B Home") , "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf1;Deploy:a0135000000kgn4", IF(OR( CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "Pre School",CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "School Age Child Care"), "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a03r0000000xtEK;Deploy:a01r0000001LWS4", "") )
CustomField.label: Drawloop_Next IA Submitted
